snippet: The judge overseeing the Colorado theater shooting case says he won't tell victims not to show emotion when they testify during the trial's penalty phase....

headline.print_headline: Theater Shooting Judge Allows Emotional Testimony
headline.main: Theater Shooting Judge Allows Emotional Testimony

lead_paragraph: The judge overseeing the Colorado theater shooting case says he won't tell victims not to show emotion when they testify during the trial's penalty phase.
